#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cstdlib>
#include <cmath>
#include <cstring>
#include <ctype.h>
#include <vector>
#include <set>
#include <map>
#include <algorithm>
#include <numeric>

#define lld long long
#define llu unsigned long long

#define rep(i,x,y) for(i=x;i<y;i++)
#define rrep(i,x,y) for(i=x;i>=y;i--)
#define trv(y,x) for(typeof(x.begin())y=x.begin();y!=x.end();y++)

using namespace std;
vector<vector<bool> >DP;
int *A;
int main()
{
    ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
	cin.tie(NULL);
	int t,n,k,i,j;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
    {
        cin>>n>>k;
        A=new int[n];
        rep(i,0,n)
            cin>>A[i];
       DP=vector<vector<bool> >(k+1,vector<bool>(n+1));
       rep(i,0,n+1)
           DP[0][i]=true;
        rep(i,1,k+1)
            DP[i][0]=false;
        rep(i,1,k+1)
            rep(j,1,n+1)
                {
                    DP[i][j]=DP[i][j-1];
                    if(i>=A[j-1])
                    DP[i][j]=DP[i][j] || DP[i-A[j-1]][j-1];
                }
        cout<<DP[k][n]<<"\n";
        DP.clear();
        delete[] A;
    }
    return 0;
}
